title: How to Make Bread Stuffing to Feed 25 People

steps.headline: Melt butter in a large pan.
Add celery and onion and cook until softened.
Remove pan from heat and add bread cubes and seasonings.
Pour mixture into a greased 9 x 13-inch baking pan.
Uncover pan and bake 15 minutes more or until browned.

text: Melt butter in a large pan.  Add celery and onion and cook until softened.  Remove pan from heat and add bread cubes and seasonings.  Toss to mix.  Pour mixture into a greased 9 x 13-inch baking pan.  Cover pan and bake 45 minutes.  Uncover pan and bake 15 minutes more or until browned.  Serves 25.
